item.title: Change MongoDB data directory in CentOS 7
item.description: It might seem simple to change the MongoDB data directory: just adjust the _*/etc/mongod.conf*_ file and that’s it. But it won’t work and here’s where you can meet the SELinux contexts...
item.dc:creator: Sergey Pogorelov

item.title: How to become a software developer?
item.description: Want to be a software developer and don't know where to start? This post is exactly for you! Nowadays a lot of people are interested in becoming a software developer. Some of them love computers and technologies and some of them just want to switch their job to a better paid one. The amount of software development courses and boot camps are instantly growing and there are more and more developers...
item.dc:creator: Sergey Pogorelov
